data.title: Visual data quality analysis for taxi GPS data
data.authors: Zuchao Wang;Xiaoru Yuan;Tangzhi Ye;Youfeng Hao;Siming Chen;Jie Liang 0004;Qiusheng Li;Haiyang Wang;Yadong Wu
data.affiliation: Wang, ZC (Corresponding Author), Peking Univ, Key Lab Machine Percept, Minist Educ, Beijing 100871, Peoples R China. Wang, Zuchao; Yuan, Xiaoru; Ye, Tangzhi; Hao, youfeng; Chen, Siming; Liang, Jie, Peking Univ, Key Lab Machine Percept, Minist Educ, Beijing 100871, Peoples R China. Wang, Zuchao; Yuan, Xiaoru; Ye, Tangzhi; Hao, youfeng; Chen, Siming; Liang, Jie, Peking Univ, Sch EECS, Beijing 100871, Peoples R China. Li, Qiusheng; Wang, Haiyang; Wu, Yadong, Southwest Univ Sci \& Technol, Sch Comp Sci \& Technol, Mianyang, Sichuan, Peoples R China.
data.abstract: We present a novel visual analysis method to systematically discover data quality problems in raw taxi GPS data. It combines semi-supervised active learning and interactive visual exploration. It helps analysts interactively discover unknown data quality problems, and automatically extract known problems. We report analysis results on Beijing taxi GPS data.
